## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c1f3e6056fccbecb4ca4438e39331f7d54029a4b3664ab2c2591edf1ff66324d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@maheshtestorg/maheshtestpackage' @ 1.0.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
